scripts.db:seed:adaptive: tsc --pretty false --skipLibCheck --module commonjs --target ES2020 scripts/seed-adaptive-bank.ts --outDir .tmp/bsc-adaptive-tools && node .tmp/bsc-adaptive-tools/scripts/seed-adaptive-bank.js
scripts.check:glossary: tsc --pretty false --skipLibCheck --module commonjs --target ES2020 scripts/check-glossary-coverage.ts --outDir /tmp/bsc-content-checks && node /tmp/bsc-content-checks/check-glossary-coverage.js
scripts.check:readability: tsc --pretty false --skipLibCheck --module commonjs --target ES2020 scripts/check-reading-level.ts --outDir /tmp/bsc-content-checks && node /tmp/bsc-content-checks/check-reading-level.js
scripts.check:adaptive:coverage: tsc --pretty false --skipLibCheck --module commonjs --target ES2020 scripts/check-adaptive-bank-coverage.ts --outDir /tmp/bsc-adaptive-tools && node /tmp/bsc-adaptive-tools/scripts/check-adaptive-bank-coverage.js
scripts.check:adaptive:balance: tsc --pretty false --skipLibCheck --module commonjs --target ES2020 scripts/check-adaptive-bank-balance.ts --outDir /tmp/bsc-adaptive-tools && node /tmp/bsc-adaptive-tools/scripts/check-adaptive-bank-balance.js
scripts.check:adaptive:duplicates: tsc --pretty false --skipLibCheck --module commonjs --target ES2020 scripts/check-adaptive-bank-duplicates.ts --outDir /tmp/bsc-adaptive-tools && node /tmp/bsc-adaptive-tools/scripts/check-adaptive-bank-duplicates.js
scripts.check:adaptive: npm run check:adaptive:coverage && npm run check:adaptive:balance && npm run check:adaptive:readability && npm run check:adaptive:duplicates
scripts.check:content: npm run check:glossary && npm run check:readability && npm run check:adaptive
